event.event-label: OpenNMS Event Gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' rejected an external event
event.descr: An event with UEI '%parm[receivedUEI]%' was received and rejected by the event gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%'
event.logmsg:
An event with UEI '%parm[receivedUEI]%' was received and rejected by the event gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%'

The http message headers identified the message source as hostHeader='%parm[hostHeader]%', refererHeader='%parm[refererHeader]%'

This event contains the following parameters %parm[all]%
event.operinstruct: Some device is sending events which are not allowed by gateway configuration '%parm[gatewayReference]%'. Check that the gateway configurations and/or the device configurations are correct.

event.event-label: OpenNMS Event Gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' received a message with additional values.
event.descr: OpenNMS Event Gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' received a message with additional values.
event.logmsg:
OpenNMS Event Gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' received a message with additional values.

The http message headers identified the message source as hostHeader='%parm[hostHeader]%', refererHeader='%parm[refererHeader]%'

This event contains the following parameters %parm[all]%
event.operinstruct: A device is sending additional message values to the gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%'. An event translator should be configured to deal with these additional message values.

event.event-label: OpenNMS Event Gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' received a message from an unauthorized user name '%parm[gatewayUsername]%'
event.descr: OpenNMS Event Gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' received a message from an unauthorized user name '%parm[gatewayUsername]%'
event.logmsg:
OpenNMS Event Gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' received a message from an unauthorized user name '%parm[gatewayUsername]%'

The http message headers identified the message source as hostHeader='%parm[hostHeader]%', refererHeader='%parm[refererHeader]%'

This event contains the following parameters %parm[all]%
event.operinstruct: A device is sending messages to the gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' with an incorrect user name '%parm[gatewayUsername]%' Check that the gateway configurations and/or the device configurations are correct.

event.event-label: OpenNMS Event Gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' received a message with a wrong password for user name '%parm[gatewayUsername]%'
event.descr: OpenNMS Event Gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' received a message message with a wrong password for user name '%parm[gatewayUsername]%'
event.logmsg:
OpenNMS Event Gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' received a message message with a wrong password for user name '%parm[gatewayUsername]%'

The http message headers identified the message source as hostHeader='%parm[hostHeader]%', refererHeader='%parm[refererHeader]%'

This event contains the following parameters %parm[all]%
event.operinstruct: A device is sending messages to the gateway '%parm[gatewayReference]%' with a wrong password for user name '%parm[gatewayUsername]%' Check that the gateway configurations and/or the device configurations are correct.
